ch0118_41_lillie/0101_0701_01_10: Alola! I was just getting ready to have some tea.
ch0118_41_lillie/0101_0701_02_10: Would you like to join me?
ch0118_41_lillie/7101_0701_01_10:
Apparently, this dress I’m wearing was inspired
by Polteageist!
ch0118_41_lillie/7101_0701_02_10:
When I’m wearing this outfit, Polteageist seems
happier than usual when it makes tea.
ch0118_41_lillie/7101_0701_03_10:
It’s fun to get dressed up for tea parties, don’t
you think?
ch0118_41_lillie/7102_0701_01_10:
Did you know Polteageist has two forms?
Apparently, it can be either Antique Form
or Phony Form.
ch0118_41_lillie/7102_0701_02_10:
People say my Polteageist is rare because it’s an
Antique Form Polteageist, but I’ve never really
thought much about it.
ch0118_41_lillie/7102_0701_03_10:
It makes no difference to me which form it
is—I just love my Polteageist for what it is!
ch0118_41_lillie/7103_0701_01_10: Polteageist’s tea has a really distinctive flavor!
ch0118_41_lillie/7103_0701_02_10: It let me drink a little once.
ch0118_41_lillie/7103_0701_03_10: Hmm, I can’t think of a way to describe it well...
ch0118_41_lillie/7103_0701_04_10:
If you ever become friends with Polteageist,
it might let you drink some, too!
ch0118_41_lillie/7104_0701_01_10: The pot my Polteageist is living in...
ch0118_41_lillie/7104_0701_02_10:
Apparently, it’s an antique—but when exactly do
you suppose it was made?
ch0118_41_lillie/7105_0701_01_10:
I’d like to get better at making sweets as
well as tea.
ch0118_41_lillie/7105_0701_02_10:
If I could do that, I’m sure I could have even more
fun with my partner Pokémon—and with you,
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0118_41_lillie/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it helps on your adventure!
ch0118_41_lillie/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard that whenever Polteageist finds some
leftover black tea, it pours itself into it.
ch0118_41_lillie/2501_0701_02_10:
Honestly, if it allows me to meet such a wonderful
Pokémon, I wouldn’t mind leaving a little tea in
my cup...
ch0118_41_lillie/2501_0701_03_10:
Wait, no! What am I talking about? Those are two
totally separate things!
ch0118_41_lillie/2501_0702_01_10: Ever since coming to Pasio, I’ve been studying tea.
ch0118_41_lillie/2501_0702_02_10:
I’ll do my best to learn more so I can make really
delicious tea for everyone!
ch0118_41_lillie/2511_0701_01_10:
Would you mind telling me your opinion of some
new tea I have?
ch0118_41_lillie/2511_0701_02_10:
I tried blending some different tea leaves together
into a flavor I thought you might like!
ch0118_41_lillie/2511_0701_03_10: Let’s have some right now with some malasadas!
ch0118_41_lillie/2511_0702_01_10:
I want to learn the proper etiquette to make and
serve tea...
ch0118_41_lillie/2511_0702_02_10:
But honestly, the most important thing to remember
is just to have fun with your friends!
ch0118_41_lillie/3001_0701_01_10:
When I wake up in the morning and feel the
sunshine hit my face, all of my sleepiness
just floats away.
ch0118_41_lillie/3003_0701_01_10:
Pasio is a lovely place, isn’t it? Everyone is so
very kind here.
ch0118_41_lillie/3005_0701_01_10:
Did you have a good day today? Fingers crossed
that tomorrow will be a good day, too!
